channel.title: I need help with a error
channel.description:
Can someone please explain this error to me it says can't find the symbol so what would i need to add. I'm learning the coding so far its going good i just wanna know what i need to put there to fix it. Hope someone can help, Thanks.
[code]starting... src\com\rs\net\decorders\handlers\ButtonHandler.java:319: error: cannot find symbol getInventory().addItem(9075); ^ symbom: method getInventory() location: class ButtonHandler 1 error press anything to continue...[/code]
This is what i'm trying to add i'm making a pk server with a 667 and in the quest tab i have like veng runes etc i'm wanting it to put the runes in there inv when they click it this is what i've made.
[code] } else if (interfaceId == 506) { switch (componentId) { case 0://veng runes getInventory().addItem(9075, 40); break;[/code]

item.title: I need help with a error
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I believe kingcobra805 was right. Try importing the class where getInventory() is defined or define it in the class that you are trying to use it in.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a error

item.title: I need help with a error
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

[quote=“kingcobra805, post:2, topic:451096”]if i’m correct you need to add the getInventory Method or add a import to where the method would be located.

i may be wrong though i use a IDE so it tells me where the problems are exactly[/quote]Hmm, i’m trying different things to see, still isnt working.

Read full topic

@kingcobra805 wrote:

i may be wrong though i use a IDE so it tells me where the problems are exactly
